body.name: Women's Junior Plus Size Basic Flare Jean
features: Premium Material: Crafted with a blend of 73% cotton, 25% polyester, and 2% spandex, our Classic Plus Size Flared Jeans offer the perfect balance of comfort and a snug fit, ensuring you look and feel your best.

Flattering Design: These classic plus size flared jeans are designed to enhance your curves. They are tailored to fit your waist and thighs while elegantly flaring out from the calves to the ankles, giving you an attractive hourglass silhouette with a boot cut, bell bottom leg.

Versatile Wardrobe Staple: Our Women's Junior Plus Size High-Waisted Flared Denim Jeans are a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Perfect for any occasion, the lightweight, stretchy fabric accentuates your waist, and the wide bell bottom legs add an elongating effect. Check the sizing chart for a perfect fit.

Everyday Elegance: These jeans are a timeless and effortless choice. Pair them with a classic white tee for a casual day look or elevate your style with a corset and heels for a sophisticated night out. No matter how you wear them, you can count on comfort and style that beautifully accentuates your natural curves.
Easy Care: Enjoy the convenience of machine-washable Plus Size Classic Flared Denim Jeans. The durable fabric ensures hassle-free care, so you can keep them looking great without any extra effort.
body.description: Whether you have long legs or short legs, flared jeans are a go-to choice for curvy women seeking figure-flattering style. These plus-size flared jeans combine timeless elegance with effortless comfort. They feature a classic 5-pocket design, a single front button closure, and essential belt loops. Our jeans are crafted from a fitted, stretchy fabric that hugs your waist and accentuates your curves. The flared, wide-legged fit adds a cool and stylish touch, making them a perfect choice for all-day and all-night wear. Elevate your curves with our classic, flattering, and comfortable flared jeans

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Some of Our Favorite YMI Jeans Styles! Look Sexy in Our Figure Flattering Distressed 70s Vibes Flare Jeans! - Comfy, stretchy denim that hugs all your curves - High-rise, fitted through the knee and flattering flare - Match with tanks, bodysuits, crop tops, sweaters etc. - Flares are super trendy and flatter your curves - These flare jeans come in regular inseam and long so select the right size for a full-length fit! Our Favorite Vintage Dream High Rise Ankle Skinny Jeans - This rigid denim look and the advanced stretch combo will give you that perfectly aged vintage vibe of your dreams! - High-rise straight ankle jeans with distressing at the knees and hem - Wear with bodysuits, crop tops, and sandals - Heavy destruction and straight cut are right on trend! - Our Dream line is known for butt-hugging stretch and vintage rigid denim on the front Our Famous WannaBettaButt Butt Sculpting High Rise Skinny Jeans Made With Recycled Fibers - Made of recycled plastic bottles blended denim and LYCRA for a comfy, flexible fit - High-waisted skinny ankle jeans with classic WBB fit - Wear them with t-shirts and jeans or dress them up with blouses and heels - Sexy and fitted, these jeans will become your go-to pair! - Sexy and fitted, these jeans will become your go-to pair!
YMI was founded in 2000 and has rapidly become one of the leading denim manufacturing companies! Our mission is to spread body positivity by providing a wide variety of styles for every body type!

Wannabettabutt Our Wannabettabutt collection features our signature heart shape butt stitching that highlights your natural curves! Our unique heart shape stitching naturally contours and lifts your bum and our uniquely crafted pockets will highlight your natural curves! From plus to petite and skinny to flared our WBB collection comes in a variety of sizes and styles, find your perfect pair today. Vintage Dream Meet our Vintage Dream jeans, our hybrid denim jean has a 100 percent denim cotton front with a stretchy butt hugging back. Our design is built for comfort with a bodycon style to highlight your natural curves and make everyone feel confident and beautiful! Our retro distressed style is perfect for any occasion, the flexible fabric moves as you move, keeping you comfortable all day long. Summer Flare Our Classic, Flared Bell Bottom, jeans are fitted along the waist and flared along the cabs elongating your legs and giving you a unique, modern, western, 70s-inspired look. The classic bell-bottom flared look is a timeless piece making this bootcut style a summer essential. Pair the flared bell-bottom jeans with a swim top and sandals for a fun summer bike ride. You can also style these flared jeans with a corset and heels for a fun night look. Elastic Waist Shorts Short story the perfect summer, vacay, lounge shorts are here! Our women’s distressed elastic waist, jogger short is the perfect summer short! The elastic waist jogger style drawstring makes it the perfect throw on beach, summer short. These jeans are perfect for a hot summer day out or a comfy relaxed day by the pool. Make these distressed, lightweight shorts your summer shorts today!

PLUS SIZE SUMMER MUST HAVE! SUMMER SHORT FLARES FOR SUMMER VINTAGE DREAM WBB WBB Drawstring Tie High Waisted Retro Distressed Fit Butt Lifting Stretchy Distressed Distressed Flexible Fabric Curve Hugging Summer Must Have Throw on short Long or Regular Inseam Distressed Hem Distressed Stay Classy and Cool in White Summer Essential Stretchy Summer Concert Must Have

Available In Plus Sizes Long Distressed WannaBettaButt High Waisted WannaBettaButt Try our WannaBettaButt flared jeans today! Made with a stretchy, lightweight fabric our WBB jeans are designed to shape and highlight your curves and bum. Our unique heart shape stitching will hug your bum in all the right places. Move freely and with confidence, try our WBB jeans today! Flared Jeans For Summer Summer Essential Hey Girl! Do you need versatile jeans for summer? Why Are Flared Jeans Perfect for Summer? Flared jeans are perfect for summer because they provide you with the body-hugging style of skinny jeans while also giving you the comfort of wide-legged Jeans. Not only are flared jeans perfect because of their comfortability but they will also keep you looking stylish all summer long. These jeans can be dressed up or dressed down, wear these jeans to a country concert or music festival, no matter how you style these jeans you'll feel comfortable all day long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable w/good mileage
reviews.reviewText: Thank goodness flare jeans came back in style! I've been waiting years to find jeans that both fit and flatter me like they used to. I have big calves thanks to genetics and bootcut just don't cut it. These stretch, move with my curves, are comfy both sitting, standing, and walking. I'm writing this review after buying another pair after the first ones finally fell to chub-rub. But I can tell you these puppies went all over Italy and Greece with me and took a beating. Well worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Near perfect fit, flattering silhouette
reviews.reviewText: Measurements: 47/43/51size purchased: 20 plusUsually size: 18-20Love these jeans. If you’re between sizes may want to go with the smaller size, I could probably tailor them down an inch for a tighter fit, but these are now my go-to comfy-yet-stylish jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For taller than people under 5'8"
reviews.reviewText: Wish they had a petite product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: So cute. So so so cute.Material is a little thin but about what I expected. Very comfortable. Did I mention super cute? Good amount of stretch and fits every curve to a T!I'm a size 20 but high rise was still a must for me and ive struggled to find high rise 20s in store so these were the perfect, affordable, comfortable solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love these pants, so much that I ordered many pairs, even going down a size because of the length… and ended up returning them all. I gave them 4 stars because they really are great but I’m not tall or short, I’m 5’6 and still they drag the ground. Bummer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Flattering
reviews.reviewText: By far the most comfortable jeans I've ever worn! I'm a size 20 and most of my weight is my belly. These jeans look really flattering and I feel confident in them!Downside is I'm 5'3" and these don't come in petite. They were a good foot too long and I had them hemmed.The other thing is the color choices. I love the light washed, but I'd love to see more colors that are not the boyfriend style.Love love love them!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank goodness, no weird baggy crotch
reviews.reviewText: I always struggle to find pants that look good since a lot of plus-size pants are super baggy in the crotch, but these fit perfectly and are super soft. really flattering, love these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used - Sent it Back
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, I was sent a used pair. I sent it right on back.
Me encanto esta muy bonito la verdad per esta un poco largo ya que yo mido 165. Pero esta super lindo !
